EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Meetups.Spring 2014 June Meetups
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Meetups in June
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us for our June meetups: Develop powerful Big Data Applications easily with Spring XD with Mark Pollack Wednesday, June 4, 2014 - New York City Pivotal Office Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0040
Java Applications in the Cloud with Ben Hale Tuesday, June 10 - San Francisco Hilton Union Square Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0042
How to integrate Hadoop with Systems with Jemish Patel Thursday, June 12 - San Francisco Pivotal Office Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0041
How We Test Cloud Foundry with Elisabeth Hendrickson Tuesday, June 17 - San Francisco Pivotal Office Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0044
An Intro to Apache Spark (with Hadoop) for Plain Old Java Geeks Tuesday, June 24 - Palo Alto Pivotal Office Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0045
Cloud Foundry Application Security Groups with Mark Kropf Wednesday, June 25 - San Francisco Pivotal Office Learn more and Register here: http://bit.ly/POSH0043
